title: Snow Falls
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 45 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: Where have you seen snow? In Snow Falls, students will read about several different places where it snows as well as when it snows. Vivid and engaging photographs will help students make visualizations and classify information. High-frequency words and repetitive phrases provide support for beginning readers.
reviewWords: clouds, desert, falls, forest, mountains, plains
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information to better understand text
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
